tool_description: This API takes initial investment amount, yearly contribution, duration (in years) and estimated interest rate and return the total amount with compound interest at the end of duration period
name: Compound Interest API
title: Compound Interest API

api_list.name: FinalAmount
api_list.description: This endpoint takes a 'POST' request with a JSON as parameter and return a JSON with final amount of a capital accumulation plan with compound interest
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://compound-interest-api.p.rapidapi.com/calculate_cp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "compound-interest-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://compound-interest-api.p.rapidapi.com/calculate_cp"

print(response.json())
